name: Ice Dancing Figure Skating
description:
Ice Dancing Figure Skating is a free game for girls. But you need a lot of practice and training before trying this at your own.You need a figure skating coach to work with you.As you will be going to perform in front of many people, you have to keep yourself confident.Twirl, trip and loop yourself carefully.This can be the excitement for preparing as a champion ice skating figure dancer.

-> Beginning a Training Regime
-> Make the decision to begin with confidence
-> Dress up and makeover appropriately
-> Practice the fundamentals of skating
-> Fall safely, Instead of getting upset, focus on getting up
-> Practicing your skating is important, Combine cardio and strength exercises
-> Try a balance or ball, soft hemisphere with a hard plastic bottom
-> Getting Competitive, Figure out your goals


There are different levels in this game in which you can help this ice skating girl. You can give her a makeup, makeover and dress her so she can look more beautiful and amazing in the contest.There will be lot of world class figure skaters in the competition and everyone will try her best to become the champion of the year in international figure skating.Ice skating girl needs you guide and encouragement.

Do not forget to play all of our other makeup, makeover, cooking, tailoring,school teacher, love crush,fitness gym, supermarket shopping, hip hop dancing, Ice Cream cooking,ballerina dance, babies and dress up games for girls and kids.

TinyBit games, tiny masterpieces !
